name: Stop The Overgrowth
description:
This is my first ever game.

I couldn't quite finish it by the deadline. I would've loved to implement more towers and plants, but school and other things got in the way. Still, I learned a lot while making this game.

Most of the art was done by filo.feelo.

---------LORE---------

You're the CEO of "NoPlants inc.", a thriving, environment-polluting enterprise. However, there's one big threat to your company's survival: NATURE!

Though this valley was once lush green with all kinds of plants, the pollution caused by your factory has turned it into a deserted wasteland. But now nature's taking back its land. If you're not careful, it might overgrow your factory and drift you to ruin!

Your job is to prevent that development. Place "Plant Incinerators" and "Toxic Waste Sprinklers" [not implemented yet :( ] strategically to stop the plants.
